app_description: Come and use it now! Communicate smoothly and conveniently with people all over the world! Text translation Translate text into more than 110 languages. Enter the phrase you want to translate to receive the results in text format or to hear the correct pronunciation. Speech translation It can recognize multiple international languages and quickly translate to the language you want. Camera Translation: Take photos and scan text from images with your camera. Translate any paper document menus signage anything easily. Unlimited use and no subscription required.
